Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Involved in Social and Tamil Literature movements since student days; contributed articles to leading Tamil and English Dailies
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc., B.L. Educated at (i) Govt. Arts College, Dharmapuri and (ii) Govt. Law College, Trichy, Tamil Nadu
Other Information: Actively involved in various youth organizations; takes special interest in working in close co-ordination with reputed NGO`s engaged in the fields of health and rural empowerment and development
